welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Perivale, a charming town known for its beautiful parks and green spaces. We invite you to explore and discover all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee is required for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal, with a 4-hour time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the larger of the two terminals and serves a variety of airlines including British Airways, EasyJet, and Virgin Atlantic.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves a variety of airlines including Ryanair, Norwegian, and TUI Airways.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for the first 90 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
